attributes.action: To check his own approval team are not stopping petitions they think are wrong
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the approval team deem the petition not to be politically correct , would this stop the petition reaching the British public. If so ,does this mean that freedom of speach is in fact dead and is there a point to even trying to get a petition approved ?

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
